name: Superbound
description:
To play this game, you need a crypto wallet and BSC testnet 1. To setup metamask:

 https://metamask.io/

2. To setup binance smart chain testnet network on metamask : 

Network Name:                       Smart Chain - Testnet 

 New RPC URL:                         https://data-seed-prebsc-1-s1.binance.org:8545/ 

 ChainID:                                       97 

 Symbol:                                        BNB 

 Block Explorer URL:            https://testnet.bscscan.com

3. To get BNB on the testnet : 

https://testnet.binance.org/faucet-smart

My brothers and I always wanted to collaborate on a game project, and now finally, an opportunity showed itself. Funnily enough, our combined skills cover all areas needed to create a game. My eldest brother Mikhail is taking care of music and SFX, And my other brother Bato takes care of visual elements(Character design, UI design, etc). As for me, I'm a programmer - I took care of all the logic, blockchain, and frontend.

This project was our first attempt at making a game, and we hope you enjoy the experience!
